src:
老朋友話題葷素不忌　費玉清怕不能給江蕙幸福
07 Nov 2019, 13:41 by 陳于嬙, 李鍾泉
費玉清與江蕙擁多年交情，兩人情誼堅貞，聊天話題葷素不拘，如今，江蕙送上熱氣球造型的「小歌號」，一句「別丟包我」，讓費玉清忍不住在台上開玩笑：「讓她（江蕙）破費了，講出這話耐人尋味啊，不好意思告訴大家，最近健康檢查，前列腺有點阻塞，不能給她性福啊！」短短幾句話，逗樂歌迷。
一唱完〈感情放一邊〉，費玉清侃侃而談與江蕙的交情，指兩人一見面、話題一開就沒完沒了，有時，江蕙開車經過費玉清家樓下，打電話劈頭就問：「你在家嗎？我去你家聊天。」就算沒有天天聯絡，但都把對方放在很重要的位置。
費玉清指，演藝圈總愛配對，江蕙的地位與歌唱實力，偶讓人感覺壓力大，但江蕙實則感性，一見面說天道地，如今，他與江蕙一樣選擇「封麥」，告別演藝圈，費玉清幽默說：「退休後，二姐也別丟包我啊！」兩人隔空對談，依舊有哏，對「江費配」，費玉清雖自嘲：「心有餘而力不足。」實則博君一笑，與江蕙有一定的相知。
更新時間｜2019.11.07 13:41
text:
Old friends are not afraid of the topic. Fei Yuqing is afraid of not giving Jiang Yan happiness.
07 Nov 2019, 13:41 by Chen Yuxi, Li Zhongquan
Fei Yuqing and Jiang Yan have many years of friendship, the two people have a strong friendship, and the chat topic is not limited. Today, Jiang Yan sent the "small song number" of the hot air balloon shape, saying "Don't lose me", so Fei Yuqing could not help but stay in Taiwan. Joking up: "Let her (Jiang Yan) break the cost, telling this words is intriguing, I am sorry to tell you that the recent health check, the prostate is a little blocked, can not give her sexual blessing!" Just a few words, amused fans.
After singing the "feeling on the side", Fei Yuqing talked about the friendship with Jiang Yan, saying that when the two met, the topic was open and there was no end. Sometimes, Jiang Yan drove through the Fei Yuqing family downstairs and called the girl. "Are you at home? I am going to your home to chat." Even if there is no contact every day, they put each other in a very important position.
Fei Yuqing pointed out that the entertainment industry always loves pairing. Jiang's status and singing strength make people feel pressure, but Jiang Yan is actually emotional. When he meets, he says that he is just like heaven. Now, he and Jiang Yan choose "sealing wheat" and say goodbye. In the entertainment industry, Fei Yuqing said humorously: "After retiring, the second sister should not lose me!" The two men still talked about each other, and they still have awkwardness. Although Fei Yuqing ridiculed himself: "There is more than enough power." In fact, Bo Jun smiled and had a certain understanding with Jiang Yan.
Update time|2019.11.07 13:41
